00039 #ifndef ORO_INPUT_PORT_SOURCE_HPP
00040 #define ORO_INPUT_PORT_SOURCE_HPP
00041 
00042 #include "Channels.hpp"
00043 #include "../base/PortInterface.hpp"
00044 
00045 namespace RTT
00046 { namespace internal {
00047 
00061     template<typename T>
00062     class InputPortSource : public DataSource<T>
00063     {
00064         InputPort<T>* port;
00065         mutable T mvalue;
00066 
00067     public:
00068         typedef typename boost::intrusive_ptr<InputPortSource<T> > shared_ptr;
00069 
00070         InputPortSource(InputPort<T>& port)
00071             : port(&port), mvalue() { }
00072 
00079         void dropPort() {
00080              port = 0;
00081         }
00082 
00083         void reset() { port->clear(); }
00084         bool evaluate() const
00085         {
00086             return port->read(mvalue) == NewData;
00087         }
00088 
00089         typename DataSource<T>::result_t value() const
00090         { return mvalue; }
00091         typename DataSource<T>::const_reference_t rvalue() const
00092         { return mvalue; }
00093         typename DataSource<T>::result_t get() const
00094         {
00095             if ( evaluate() )
00096                 return value();
00097             else
00098                 return T();
00099         }
00100         DataSource<T>* clone() const
00101         { return new InputPortSource<T>(*port); }
00102         DataSource<T>* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const
00103         { return const_cast<InputPortSource<T>*>(this); }
00104     };
00105 }}
00106 
00107 #endif
